nodes.text: The Jidlor system was located in the Jidlor Marches, a part of the Mid Rim. The system was home to the sentient Swaze species. Each standard year, the rulers of the Swaze were sent to Rellnas Minor, a moon in the Expansion Region's Rell system. There, the Swaze rulers sought advice from the un'Yala, chiefs of the indigenous Rellarin species who were widely known for their wisdom.

The Jidlor system was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 12: Aliens — Enemies and Allies, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The section of the book mentioning the system was authored by Craig Robert Carey. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Jidlor system in grid square J-16.
